intro.description:
In this tutorial, you learn how to create new themes and edit their components.
If the views you need to perform this tutorial are not visible, select Window -> Show View and select the view you want.
After each step, move to the next step by clicking the button located at the bottom of the step: Click to Perform (if you want the step to be performed automatically), Click to Skip (if you want to perform the step manually) or Click to Complete (if no automatisation is available). If you do not use the buttons to move between steps, the automated tutorial functions become inavailable. To start this tutorial, click the Click to Begin button below.

item.title: Create a new theme.
item.description: In the menu bar, select File -> Create New Theme. A New Theme window opens. In the Theme name field, enter Tutorial. Click Finish. Click Click to Perform to create a new Theme automatically.

item.title: Select the Application Grid screen for editing.
item.description: In the Gallery view, select the Application Grid screen from the drop-down menu.

item.title: Change the color of the Contacts icon.
item.description: Click the Contacts icon. In the Properties view, select Bitmap tab. Click Colorize checkbox to change colorize to true. Click the Color button that appears next to the checkbox. Select a new color and click OK. Click Click to Perform to change the color automatically.

item.title: Save the theme.
item.description: Select File -> Save. Click Click to Perform to save the theme automatically.
